verses.verse: <S%G3063>Finally,<s%> my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> To <S%G1125>write<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> things to you, to me <S%G3303>indeed<s%> is not <S%G3636>grievous,<s%> but for you it is <S%G804>safe.<s%>
<S%G991>Beware<s%> of <S%G2965>dogs,<s%> <S%G991>beware<s%> of <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G2040>workers,<s%> <S%G991>beware<s%> of the <S%G2699>concision.<s%>

For we are the <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3000>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and <S%G2744>rejoice<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and have <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3982>confidence<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

<S%G2539>Though<s%> I might <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4006>confidence<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> man <S%G1380>thinks<s%> that he has whereof he might <S%G3982>trust<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> I <S%G3123>more:<s%>

<S%G4061>Circumcised<s%> the <S%G3637>eighth<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> of the <S%G1085>stock<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin,<s%> an <S%G1446>Hebrew<s%> of the <S%G1445>Hebrews;<s%> as <S%G2596>touching<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee;<s%>

<S%G2596>Concerning<s%> <S%G2205>zeal,<s%> <S%G1377>persecuting<s%> the <S%G1577>church;<s%> <S%G2596>touching<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G273>blameless.<s%>
But <S%G3748>what<s%> things were <S%G2771>gain<s%> to me, <S%G5023>those<s%> I <S%G2233>counted<s%> <S%G2209>loss<s%> for <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G235>Yes<s%> <S%G3304>doubtless,<s%> and I <S%G2233>count<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things but <S%G2209>loss<s%> for the <S%G5242>excellency<s%> of the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> my <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> for <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2210>suffered<s%> the <S%G2210>loss<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and do <S%G2233>count<s%> them but <S%G4657>dung,<s%> that I may <S%G2770>win<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

And be <S%G2147>found<s%> in him, not <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> but that <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is of <S%G2316>God<s%> by <S%G4102>faith:<s%>

That I may <S%G1097>know<s%> him, and the <S%G1411>power<s%> of his <S%G386>resurrection,<s%> and the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of his <S%G3804>sufferings,<s%> being <S%G4832>made<s%> <S%G4832>conformable<s%> to his <S%G2288>death;<s%>
<S%G1513>If<s%> by <S%G4458>any<s%> <S%G4458>means<s%> I might <S%G2658>attain<s%> to the <S%G1815>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

Not as <S%G3754>though<s%> I had <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2983>attained,<s%> <S%G2228>either<s%> were <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G5048>perfect:<s%> but I <S%G1377>follow<s%> after, <S%G1499>if<s%> that I may <S%G2638>apprehend<s%> that for <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> I am <S%G2638>apprehended<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> I <S%G3049>count<s%> not myself to have <S%G2638>apprehended:<s%> but this <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1520>thing<s%> I do, <S%G1950>forgetting<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are <S%G3694>behind,<s%> and <S%G1901>reaching<s%> <S%G1901>forth<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are <S%G1715>before,<s%>
I <S%G1377>press<s%> <S%G2596>toward<s%> the <S%G4649>mark<s%> for the <S%G1017>prize<s%> of the <S%G507>high<s%> <S%G2821>calling<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

Let us <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> as be <S%G5046>perfect,<s%> be <S%G5124>thus<s%> <S%G5426>minded:<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> in <S%G1536>any<s%> thing you be <S%G2088>otherwise<s%> <S%G5426>minded,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G601>reveal<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> to you.

<S%G4133>Nevertheless,<s%> <S%G1519>whereto<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G5348>already<s%> <S%G5348>attained,<s%> let us <S%G4748>walk<s%> by the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2583>rule,<s%> let us <S%G5426>mind<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> thing.

<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> be <S%G4831>followers<s%> <S%G4831>together<s%> of me, and <S%G4648>mark<s%> them which <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> as you <S%G2192>have<s%> us for an <S%G5179>ensample.<s%>

(For <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4043>walk,<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3004>told<s%> you <S%G3740>often,<s%> and <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> you <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2799>weeping,<s%> that they are the <S%G2190>enemies<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

<S%G3739>Whose<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> is <S%G684>destruction,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is their <S%G2836>belly,<s%> and <S%G3588>whose<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> is in their <S%G152>shame,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%> <S%G1919>earthly<s%> things.)

For our <S%G4175>conversation<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> from <S%G3739>where<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G553>look<s%> for the <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

Who shall <S%G3345>change<s%> our <S%G5014>vile<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> that it may be <S%G4832>fashioned<s%> <S%G4832>like<s%> to his <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1753>working<s%> <S%G3588>whereby<s%> he is <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G5293>subdue<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things to <S%G1438>himself.<s%>
